00176 template <class Argument, class Result, class Fulcrums>
00177 inline int TFulcrumGridFunctionBase<Argument, Result, Fulcrums>::GetLayersCount(int dimension) const
00178 {
00179        I_ASSERT(dimension >= 0);
00180        I_ASSERT(dimension < int(m_layers.size()));
00181 
00182        return m_layers[dimension].size();

00186 template <class Argument, class Result, class Fulcrums>
00187 inline double TFulcrumGridFunctionBase<Argument, Result, Fulcrums>::GetLayerPosition(int dimension, int layerIndex) const
00188 {
00189        I_ASSERT(dimension >= 0);
00190        I_ASSERT(dimension < int(m_layers.size()));
00191 
00192        const LayerPositions& positions = m_layers[dimension];
00193 
00194        I_ASSERT(layerIndex >= 0);
00195        I_ASSERT(layerIndex < int(positions.size()));
00196 
00197        return positions[layerIndex];
00198 }

00204 void TFulcrumGridFunctionBase<Argument, Result, Fulcrums>::Reset()
00205 {
00206        m_fulcrums.Reset();
00207 
00208        for (Layers::iterator iter = m_layers.begin(); iter != m_layers.end(); ++iter){
00209               iter->clear();
00210        }
00211 }

00215 bool TFulcrumGridFunctionBase<Argument, Result, Fulcrums>::SetDimensionsCount(int count)
00216 {
00217        if (m_fulcrums.SetDimensionsCount(count)){
00218               m_layers.resize(count);
00219 
00220               return true;
00221        }
00222 
00223        return false;
00224 }

00228 void TFulcrumGridFunctionBase<Argument, Result, Fulcrums>::SetLayersCount(int dimension, int count)
00229 {
00230        I_ASSERT(dimension >= 0);
00231        I_ASSERT(dimension < int(m_layers.size()));
00232 
00233        m_layers[dimension].resize(count);
00234        m_fulcrums.SetSize(dimension, count);

00238 template <class Argument, class Result, class Fulcrums>
00239 void TFulcrumGridFunctionBase<Argument, Result, Fulcrums>::SetLayerPosition(int dimension, int layerIndex, double position)
00240 {
00241        I_ASSERT(dimension >= 0);
00242        I_ASSERT(dimension < int(m_layers.size()));
00243 
00244        LayerPositions& positions = m_layers[dimension];
00245 
00246        I_ASSERT(layerIndex >= 0);
00247        I_ASSERT(layerIndex < int(positions.size()));
00248 
00249        istd::CChangeNotifier notifier(this, CF_SORT_LAYERS | CF_MODEL);
00250 
00251        positions[layerIndex] = position;
00252 }

00255 template <class Argument, class Result, class Fulcrums>
00256 void TFulcrumGridFunctionBase<Argument, Result, Fulcrums>::GetFulcrumPosition(const FulcrumIndex& index, ArgumentType& result) const
00257 {
00258        int layersCount = int(m_layers.size());
00259        I_ASSERT(layersCount <= index.GetDimensionsCount());
00260 
00261        result.SetElementsCount(layersCount);
00262 
00263        for (int i = 0; i < layersCount; ++i){
00264               const LayerPositions& positions = m_layers[i];
00265 
00266               I_ASSERT(index[i] >= 0);
00267               I_ASSERT(index[i] < int(positions.size()));
00268 
00269               result[i] = positions[index[i]];
00270        }
00271 }

00290 
00291 template <class Argument, class Result, class Fulcrums>
00292 int TFulcrumGridFunctionBase<Argument, Result, Fulcrums>::InsertLayer(int dimension, double position)
00293 {
00294        I_ASSERT(dimension >= 0);
00295        I_ASSERT(dimension < m_fulcrums.GetDimensionsCount());
00296 
00297        Fulcrums newFulcrums = m_fulcrums;
00298 
00299        newFulcrums.SetSize(dimension, m_fulcrums.GetSize(dimension) + 1);
00300 
00301        int layerIndex = FindLayerIndex(dimension, position);
00302 
00303        LayerPositions& positions = m_layers[dimension];
00304 
00305        double prevPosition = position;
00306        double nextPosition = position;
00307        if (!positions.empty()){
00308               if (layerIndex >= 0){
00309                      prevPosition = positions[layerIndex];
00310               }
00311               if (layerIndex < GetLayersCount(dimension) - 1){
00312                      nextPosition = positions[layerIndex + 1];
00313               }
00314        }
00315        I_ASSERT(position >= prevPosition);
00316        I_ASSERT(position <= nextPosition);
00317 
00318        double prevFactor = 0.5;
00319        if (nextPosition - prevPosition > I_BIG_EPSILON){
00320               prevFactor = (position - prevPosition) / (nextPosition - prevPosition);
00321 
00322               I_ASSERT(prevFactor >= 0);
00323               I_ASSERT(prevFactor - I_EPSILON <= 1.0);
00324        }
00325        double nextFactor = 1 - prevFactor;
00326 
00327        int oldLayersCount = int(positions.size());
00328        I_ASSERT(oldLayersCount == m_fulcrums.GetSize(dimension));
00329 
00330        for (         typename Fulcrums::Iterator destIter = newFulcrums.Begin();
00331                             destIter != newFulcrums.End();
00332                             ++destIter){
00333               ArgumentType sourceIndex = destIter;
00334               if ((destIter[dimension] >= layerIndex) && (sourceIndex[dimension] > 0)){
00335                      sourceIndex[dimension]--;
00336 
00337                      if ((destIter[dimension] == layerIndex) && (layerIndex < oldLayersCount)){
00338                             ArgumentType prevFulcrumPosition;
00339                             GetFulcrumPosition(sourceIndex, prevFulcrumPosition);
00340 
00341                             ArgumentType nextFulcrumPosition;
00342                             GetFulcrumPosition(destIter, nextFulcrumPosition);
00343 
00344                             ArgumentType position = prevFactor * prevFulcrumPosition + nextFactor * nextFulcrumPosition;
00345 
00346                             newFulcrums[destIter] = GetValueAt(position);
00347 
00348                             continue;
00349                      }
00350               }
00351 
00352               *destIter = m_fulcrums[sourceIndex];
00353        }
00354 
00355        positions.insert(positions.begin() + layerIndex + 1, position);
00356        m_fulcrums = newFulcrums;
00357        
00358        return layerIndex;
00359 }
00360 
00361 
00362 template <class Argument, class Result, class Fulcrums>
00363 void TFulcrumGridFunctionBase<Argument, Result, Fulcrums>::RemoveLayer(int dimension, int layerIndex)
00364 {
00365        I_ASSERT(dimension >= 0);
00366        I_ASSERT(dimension < GetDimensionsCount());
00367        I_ASSERT(m_fulcrums.GetSize(dimension) > 0);
00368 
00369        Fulcrums newFulcrums = m_fulcrums;
00370 
00371        newFulcrums.SetSize(dimension, m_fulcrums.GetSize(dimension) + 1);
00372 
00373        LayerPositions& positions = m_layers[dimension];
00374 
00375        for (         typename Fulcrums::Iterator destIter = newFulcrums.Begin();
00376                             destIter != newFulcrums.End();
00377                             ++destIter){
00378               FulcrumIndex sourceIndex = destIter;
00379               if (destIter[dimension] >= layerIndex){
00380                      sourceIndex.IncreaseAt(dimension);
00381               }
00382 
00383               *destIter = m_fulcrums[sourceIndex];
00384        }
00385 
00386        positions.erase(positions.begin() + layerIndex);
00387        m_fulcrums = newFulcrums;
00388 }

00391 // reimplemented (iser::ISerializable)
00392 
00393 template <class Argument, class Result, class Fulcrums>
00394 bool TFulcrumGridFunctionBase<Argument, Result, Fulcrums>::Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive)
00395 {
00396        bool retVal = true;
00397 
00398        iser::CArchiveTag gridTag("Grid", "Description of fulcrums grid");
00399        iser::CArchiveTag positionsTag("Positions", "List of positions at single axis of fulcrum grid");
00400        iser::CArchiveTag positionTag("Position", "Single layer position");
00401        iser::CArchiveTag fulcrumsTag("Fulcrums", "List of fulcrums");
00402        iser::CArchiveTag fulcrumTag("Fulcrum", "Single fulcrum");
00403 
00404        bool isStoring = archive.IsStoring();
00405 
00406        istd::CChangeNotifier notifier(isStoring? NULL: this);
00407 
00408        int dimensionsCount = m_fulcrums.GetDimensionsCount();
00409        I_ASSERT(dimensionsCount == int(m_layers.size()));
00410 
00411        retVal = retVal && archive.BeginMultiTag(gridTag, positionsTag, dimensionsCount);
00412 
00413        if (!isStoring && (dimensionsCount != m_fulcrums.GetDimensionsCount())){
00414               if (!SetDimensionsCount(dimensionsCount)){
00415                      return false;
00416               }
00417        }
00418 
00419        FulcrumSizes sizes = m_fulcrums.GetSizes();
00420        I_ASSERT(sizes.GetDimensionsCount() >= dimensionsCount);
00421 
00422        for (int dimensionIndex = 0; dimensionIndex < dimensionsCount; ++dimensionIndex){
00423               LayerPositions& positions = m_layers[dimensionIndex];
00424 
00425               int& positionsCount = sizes[dimensionIndex];
00426               I_ASSERT(positionsCount == int(positions.size()));
00427 
00428               retVal = retVal && archive.BeginMultiTag(positionsTag, positionTag, positionsCount);
00429 
00430               if (!isStoring){
00431                      if (!retVal){
00432                             Reset();
00433 
00434                             return false;
00435                      }
00436 
00437                      SetLayersCount(dimensionIndex, positionsCount);
00438               }
00439 
00440               for (int positionIndex = 0; positionIndex < positionsCount; ++positionIndex){
00441                      retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(positionTag);
00442                      retVal = retVal && archive.Process(positions[positionIndex]);
00443                      retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(positionTag);
00444               }
00445 
00446               retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(positionsTag);
00447        }
00448 
00449        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(gridTag);
00450 
00451        retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(fulcrumsTag);
00452 
00453        for (         typename Fulcrums::Iterator iter = m_fulcrums.Begin();
00454                             iter != m_fulcrums.End();
00455                             ++iter){
00456               FulcrumType& point = *iter;
00457 
00458               retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(fulcrumTag);
00459               retVal = retVal && point.Serialize(archive);
00460               retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(fulcrumTag);
00461        }
00462 
00463        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(fulcrumsTag);
00464 
00465        return retVal;
00466 }

00471 template <class Argument, class Result, class Fulcrums>
00472 void TFulcrumGridFunctionBase<Argument, Result, Fulcrums>::SortFulcrums()
00473 {
00474        for (Layers::iterator iter = m_layers.begin(); iter != m_layers.end(); ++iter){
00475               LayerPositions& positions = *iter;
00476 
00477               std::sort(positions.begin(), positions.end());
00478        }
00479 }

00482 template <class Argument, class Result, class Fulcrums>
00483 int TFulcrumGridFunctionBase<Argument, Result, Fulcrums>::FindLayerIndex(int dimension, double value) const
00484 {
00485        I_ASSERT(dimension >= 0);
00486        I_ASSERT(dimension < GetDimensionsCount());
00487 
00488        EnsureCacheValid();
00489 
00490        const LayerPositions& positions = m_layers[dimension];
00491 
00492        int left = 0;
00493        int right = int(positions.size());
00494 
00495        while (left != right){
00496               int center = (left + right) / 2;
00497 
00498               if (value >= positions[center]){
00499                      left = center + 1;
00500               }
00501               else{
00502                      right = center;
00503               }
00504        }
00505 
00506        return left - 1;
00507 }
00508 
00509 
00510 template <class Argument, class Result, class Fulcrums>
00511 typename Fulcrums::IndexType
00512                      TFulcrumGridFunctionBase<Argument, Result, Fulcrums>::FindIndices(const ArgumentType& argument) const
00513 {
00514        int dimensionsCount = GetDimensionsCount();
00515 
00516        FulcrumIndex retVal(dimensionsCount);
00517 
00518        for (int i = 0; i < dimensionsCount; ++i){
00519               retVal[i] = FindLayerIndex(i, argument[i]);
00520        }
00521 
00522        return retVal;
00523 }

00527 
00528 template <class Argument, class Result, class Fulcrums>
00529 bool TFulcrumGridFunctionBase<Argument, Result, Fulcrums>::CalculateCache(int changeFlags)
00530 {
00531        bool retVal = BaseClass::CalculateCache(changeFlags);
00532 
00533        if ((changeFlags & CF_SORT_LAYERS) != 0){
00534               SortFulcrums();
00535        }
00536 
00537        return retVal;
00538 }
